channel.title: Vax Attacks on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Vax Attacks on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Fired CDC Director Says RFK Jr. Pressured Her to Blindly Approve Vaccine Changes
item.description: Susan Monarez told a Senate committee that Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. demanded she dismiss career officials without cause—and accept vaccine recommendations regardless of whether science backed them up.
